fun_facts: A group of crows is called a 'murder.'
The shortest war in history lasted just 38 minutes between Britain and Zanzibar in 1896.
A snail can sleep for three years.
The heart of a blue whale is so large that a human can swim through its arteries.
The world's largest desert is Antarctica.
A jiffy is an actual unit of time, equal to 1/100th of a second.
The fingerprints of a koala are so similar to humans that they can taint crime scenes.
The longest time between two twins being born is 87 days.
A group of owls is called a 'parliament.'
The world's largest snowflake on record was 15 inches wide.
A single strand of spaghetti is called a 'spaghetto.'
The average person walks the equivalent of five times around the world in their lifetime.
The world's oldest known 'your mom' joke is 3,500 years old.
A lion's roar can be heard from five miles away.
The average person produces enough saliva in their lifetime to fill two swimming pools.
The unicorn is Scotland's national animal.
A group of jellyfish is called a 'smack.'
The Eiffel Tower can be 15 cm taller in summer due to thermal expansion.
A day on Mercury lasts 59 Earth days.
The world's largest living organism is a fungus in Oregon that covers over 2,385 acres.
A bolt of lightning is five times hotter than the surface of the sun.
The average person spends six months of their lifetime waiting for red lights to turn green.
A group of hedgehogs is called a 'prickle.'
The world's largest pumpkin weighed over 2,600 pounds.
A day on Jupiter lasts just 10 hours.
The average cloud weighs about 1.1 million pounds.
A group of frogs is called an 'army.'
The world's largest snowman was over 122 feet tall.
A shrimp's heart is located in its head.
The longest recorded flight of a chicken is 13 seconds.
A group of ferrets is called a 'business.'
The world's largest living tree is a giant sequoia named General Sherman.
A day on Saturn lasts about 10.7 hours.
The average person will spend about 25 years sleeping in their lifetime.
A group of flamingos is called a 'flamboyance.'
The world's largest chocolate bar weighed over 12,000 pounds.
A group of kangaroos is called a 'mob.'
The average person has about 100,000 hairs on their head.

The world's largest ice cream cake weighed over 12,000 pounds.

The average person will eat about 35 tons of food in their lifetime.

The world's largest pizza was over 1261 square meters.
A group of butterflies is called a 'kaleidoscope.'
The average person will produce enough body heat in 30 minutes to bring a gallon of water to a boil.
A group of ants is called a 'colony.'
The world's largest rubber band ball weighed over 4,000 pounds.
A group of zebras is called a 'dazzle.'

riddles.question: What has keys but can't open locks
